summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1659, for the improvement of the alley in Blocks 14, 15 and 16, David S. Maynard's Plat of the Town (now City) of Seattle, by paving and planking the same, and by laying such sewers, of proper dimensions and material, as may be necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 17541 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
